page.title: 19A DAY IN MATTHEW'S LIFE
page.content: I wake up at about 7 o'clock and I get ready.Then I go down stairs and have my breakfast.After I have had my breakfast I switch the television on and watch the computer programme on TV.A.M.Then I switch over to Breakfast Time and watch sport.After sport I switch the television off.Then I clean my teeth and comb my hair.Then I get our computer out and start playing Mr.Wimpy.After so many games I have a drink then shine my shoes and put them on,then I put my coat on.Round about 20 to 9 my sister and I go to school.When we get to school I hang my coat up and go out to play.Then the whistle goes and we go in.I put the chairs out with two others.Then we have assembly.After assembly we have maths.We have playtime.During play time we play football.Then after play we have English.Then its dinner time.
